title: Calculate Beginning of Month from a Given Date
description: This function calculates the start date of the month for a given date input. It adjusts the input date by subtracting the number of seconds corresponding to the days in that month.
name: MONTH_BEGIN

input.name: idate
input.description: The input date from which the beginning of the month is to be calculated.

output.name: MONTH_BEGIN
output.description: The calculated beginning date of the month derived from the input date.

return_value.description: The date representing the start of the month for the given input date.
